suite.name: Settings Test

test.name: Tentar salvar com os campos em branco

kw.name: Abrindo browser e logando com usuario "test@test.com" "test123", "106"
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Name não pode ficar em branco'.

Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Devo ver mensagem "Password confirmation não pode ficar em branco"
Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.msg: Page should have contained text 'Password confirmation não pode ficar em branco' but did not.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.status: Page should have contained text 'Password confirmation não pode ficar em branco' but did not.
